title: Montreal to ban use of propane, natural gas, heating oil in new buildings
author: Jason Magder
blurb: The plan is part of the city's efforts to make its buildings emissions free by the year 2040.

title: Opinion: Let's break the myths about Quebec's tuition hikes
author: Graham Carr
blurb: Oversimplifications abound but the situation is more nuanced. As president of Concordia University, I can set the record straight.

title: Pedestrian, 72, hit by car in Pointe-Claire
author: Montreal Gazette
blurb: Traffic was barred from St-Jean Blvd. between Brunswick and Salaberry Blvds. and on Labrosse Ave. between Auto Plaza Ave. and Revcon Ave.

title: Sophie Grégoire Trudeau 're-partnered' with Ottawa doctor, ex-wife claims in divorce petition
author: Special to National Post
blurb: The surgeon's ex-wife cited 'discomfort' and security concerns over the 'new relationship,' months before announcement of Trudeau separation

title: Back off creating Santé Québec, six former premiers urge Legault
author: Aaron Derfel
blurb: "We feel that this ... is a dangerous step away from the reform's objective of making the health and social services network more efficient," the ex-premiers say in an open letter.
